standardRacialTraits.blurb: Creatures blessed with a celestial bloodline, aasimars seem human except for some exotic quality that betrays their otherworldly origin. While aasimars are nearly always beautiful, something simultaneously a part of and apart from humanity, not all of them are good, though very few are evil. Idyllkin possess bestial aspects and calm dispositions, and often act as peaceful intermediaries between lawful and chaotic agents of good.

base.speed: Aasimars have a base speed of 30 feet

racial.name: Celestial Resistance
racial.description: Aasimars have acid resistance 5, cold resistance 5, and electricity resistance 5.

racial.name: Alignment
racial.description: NG

racial.name: Skilled
racial.description: Idyllkin have a +2 racial bonus on Handle Animal and Survival checks.

racial.name: Spell-Like Ability
racial.description: Idyllkin can use Summon Nature's Ally II once per day as a spell-like ability (caster level equal to the aasimar’s class level).

racial.name: Darkvision
racial.description: Aasimar have darkvision 60 ft. (they can see perfectly in the dark up to 60 feet.)

standardRacialTraits.blurb: Creatures blessed with a celestial bloodline, aasimars seem human except for some exotic quality that betrays their otherworldly origin. While aasimars are nearly always beautiful, something simultaneously a part of and apart from humanity, not all of them are good, though very few are evil. Angelkin are mortal paragons of exceptional beauty, and they serve as exemplars of good and light regardless of the myriad forms they may take.

standardRacialTraits.blurb: Creatures blessed with a celestial bloodline, aasimars seem human except for some exotic quality that betrays their otherworldly origin. While aasimars are nearly always beautiful, something simultaneously a part of and apart from humanity, not all of them are good, though very few are evil. Lawbringers are champions of justice and of doling out punishment to the wicked, and often believe chaos is the cause of all mortal suffering.

standardRacialTraits.blurb: Creatures blessed with a celestial bloodline, aasimars seem human except for some exotic quality that betrays their otherworldly origin. While aasimars are nearly always beautiful, something simultaneously a part of and apart from humanity, not all of them are good, though very few are evil. The musetouched epitomize freedom and joy, and travel the world to liberate less fortunate individuals.

standardRacialTraits.blurb: Creatures blessed with a celestial bloodline, aasimars seem human except for some exotic quality that betrays their otherworldly origin. While aasimars are nearly always beautiful, something simultaneously a part of and apart from humanity, not all of them are good, though very few are evil. Their shimmering avian features make plumekith instantly recognizable. Though they can act rashly, plumekith never shirk their duty after making a commitment.

standardRacialTraits.blurb: Creatures blessed with a celestial bloodline, aasimars seem human except for some exotic quality that betrays their otherworldly origin. While aasimars are nearly always beautiful, something simultaneously a part of and apart from humanity, not all of them are good, though very few are evil. Masters of fire magic, emberkin feel the dual pull of their peri forebear as well as that of a fallen angel further down their ancestry, and wrestle with their urges to do both good and evil.
